item.title: AMC 娱乐公司因影院上座率下降而收入减少
item.description: AMC Entertainment 周三公布第一季度收入下降了 9.3%，原因是好莱坞电影公司大片上映减少导致其电影院上座率下降。【原文：AMC Entertainment on Wednesday reported a 9.3% fall in first-quarter revenue, as fewer blockbuster releases from Hollywood studios led to reduced attendance at its movie theaters.】

item.title: 据 TechCrunch 报道，特斯拉的 "Robotaxi "商标因过于通用而被驳回
item.description: 据 TechCrunch 周三援引一份文件报道，美国专利商标局拒绝了特斯拉为其汽车申请 "Robotaxi "商标的尝试。【原文：The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has refused Tesla's attempt to trademark the term "Robotaxi" in reference to its vehicles, TechCrunch reported on Wednesday, citing a filing.】

item.title: 微软敦促参议员加快人工智能许可审批，促进政府数据访问
item.description: 根据路透社看到的书面证词，微软总裁布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）周四将敦促美国立法者简化联邦对人工智能能源需求的许可，并开放更多的政府数据集用于人工智能训练。【原文：Microsoft President Brad Smith on Thursday will urge U.S. lawmakers to streamline federal permitting for artificial intelligence energy needs and open more government data sets for AI training, according to written testimony seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，谷歌全球业务部门裁员约 200 人
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引知情人士的话报道，谷歌周二在其负责销售和合作的全球业务部门裁员约 200 人。【原文：Google on Tuesday cut about 200 employees across its global business unit, which is responsible for sales and partnerships, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing a person with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第一季度净利润下降 2%，但超出预期
item.description: 新加坡最大的银行星展集团周四公布，第一季度净利润同比下降2%，这是自2022年第一季度以来的首次下降，主要原因是实施15%的全球最低税率导致税收支出增加。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted on Thursday a 2% fall in net profit in the first quarter from a year earlier, the first drop since the first quarter of 2022, mainly due to higher tax expenses from implementation of the 15% global minimum tax.】

item.title: 软件供应商称，黑客攻击后，美国学区面临勒索企图
item.description: 美国教育软件和云服务提供商 PowerSchool 周三发表声明称，黑客试图利用之前从该公司窃取的数据敲诈美国 "多个 "学区。【原文：Hackers have tried to extort "multiple" school districts in the United States using previously stolen data from education software and cloud provider PowerSchool, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西央行将利率上调至近 20 年新高，下一步行动尚未确定
item.description: 巴西央行周三连续第六次加息，将利率上调 50 个基点，将借贷成本推升至近 20 年来的最高点。【原文：Brazil's central bank raised interest rates by 50 basis points on Wednesday in a sixth straight hike that pushed borrowing costs to their highest in nearly 20 years, and left future steps open amid global uncertainties and sticky domestic inflation.】

item.title: 美国法官将于 5 月 14 日前就美国原住民反对的力拓铜矿项目做出裁决
item.description: 一名美国联邦法官表示，他将在 5 月 14 日前就是否阻止特朗普政府将亚利桑那州的土地转让给力拓和必和必拓，以建造一座遭到美国原住民反对的大型铜矿做出裁决。【原文：A U.S. federal judge said he will rule by May 14 on whether to block the Trump administration from transferring Arizona land to Rio Tinto and BHP to build a major copper mine opposed by Native Americans.】

item.title: 埃克森同意向日本丸红供应低碳合成氨
item.description: 埃克森美孚周三表示，该美国石油生产商已签署一项长期协议，每年向日本贸易商丸红供应 25 万吨低碳氨水，这是埃克森美孚为其位于得克萨斯州贝敦的氢气设施计划签署的第一份客户协议。【原文：Exxon Mobil has signed a long-term agreement to supply 250,000 metric tons of low-carbon ammonia annually to Japanese trading house Marubeni , the U.S. oil producer said on Wednesday, representing Exxon's first signed customer agreement for its planned hydrogen facility in Baytown, Texas.】

item.title: 英国政府控制下的英国钢铁公司将提高产量、招聘员工
item.description: 英国钢铁公司（British Steel）周三表示，在英国政府于 4 月份从中国所有者手中接管该集团后，该公司将招聘 180 多名新员工，准备提高产量。【原文：British Steel said on Wednesday it would hire over 180 new staff as it prepares to ramp up production following the British government's operational seizure of the group from its Chinese owners in April.】

item.title: 连线》报道：OpenAI 与美国 FDA 就在药物评估中使用人工智能举行会谈
item.description: 科技新闻平台《连线》（Wired）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 和美国食品和药物管理局一直在开会讨论卫生监管机构使用人工智能的问题。【原文：OpenAI and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration have been meeting to discuss the health regulator's use of AI, technology news platform Wired reported on Wednesday, citing sources with knowledge of the meetings.】

item.title: Skyworks 预测第三季度业绩乐观，任命新首席财务官
item.description: 苹果公司供应商 Skyworks Solutions 周三预计第三季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，这表明尽管贸易紧张局势持续，但市场对其模拟芯片的需求仍有弹性。【原文：Apple supplier Skyworks Solutions on Wednesday forecast third-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates, signaling resilient demand for its analog chips despite ongoing trade tensions.】

item.title: 顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 第一季度利润低于预期，原因是油田活动推迟
item.description: 本周三，Nutrien 公司的第一季度利润低于华尔街预期，因为这家顶级钾肥生产商受到了北美潮湿天气造成的田间活动延迟的影响。【原文：Nutrien fell short of Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the top potash producer was impacted by delayed field activity due to wet weather conditions in North America.】

item.title: 交易日：从贸易、中国和美联储中汲取积极因素
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: TASER 制造商 Axon 上调年度收入预期，股价大涨
item.description: TASER制造商Axon Enterprise周三上调了全年营收预期，这主要得益于对其软件产品和安全设备的持续需求，盘后股价上涨超过7%。【原文：TASER maker Axon Enterprise raised its full-year revenue forecast on Wednesday, banking on sustained demand for its software products and security devices, sending its shares up more than 7% after the bell.】

item.title: 美国人造肉需求下滑，Beyond Meat 撤回年度预测
item.description: 由于宏观经济波动和美国的高通胀率，本已在消费者需求疲软的困境中挣扎的人造肉生产商面临更大压力，Beyond Meat 周三撤回了其年度销售目标。【原文：Beyond Meat on Wednesday withdrew its annual sales target as macroeconomic volatility and high inflation in the United States added further pressure on faux-meat makers already struggling with weak consumer demand.】

item.title: 由于种子价格上涨，Corteva 公司第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受种子价格上涨的影响，美国农用化学品公司 Corteva 周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：U.S. agrichemicals firm Corteva beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher prices for its seeds.】

item.title: 赌徒连胜，Fanduel 所有者下调美国利润预期
item.description: 全球最大的在线博彩公司 Fanduel 的所有者 Flutter 周三下调了美国全年利润增长预期，因为赌徒们的连胜连续两个季度打击了该公司的盈利。【原文：Fanduel-owner Flutter cut its forecast for full-year U.S. profit growth on Wednesday after a winning streak for gamblers hit earnings at the world's largest online betting company for the second quarter in a row.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，对冲基金千禧年与高盛的彼得希尔合伙公司（Petershill Partners）就出售股份事宜进行谈判
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，对冲基金千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）正在与高盛旗下的彼得希尔合伙公司（Petershill Partners）进行谈判，为其管理公司的少数股权寻找潜在买家。【原文：Hedge fund Millennium Management is in talks with Goldman Sachs' Petershill Partners to identify potential buyers for a minority stake in its management company, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道乌克兰考虑在地缘政治调整中从美元转向欧元
item.description: 美国推出可能是一个世纪以来最高的关税促使一些观察家质疑美元作为全球储备货币的未来作用。【原文：The U.S. introducing what could be the highest tariffs in a century has prompted some observers to question the future role of the dollar as global reserve currency.】

item.title: 据 Politico 报道，特朗普最早将于下周签署关于药品价格的命令
item.description: 据 Politico 周三援引三位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计最早将于下周签署一项行政命令，通过将政府为某些药品支付的费用与国外较低的价格挂钩的方式，重启降低药品成本的努力。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order as early as next week that would revive an effort to decrease drug costs by tying the amount the government pays for some medicines to lower prices abroad, Politico reported on Wednesday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 16 个州和华盛顿特区就电动汽车充电站资金问题起诉特朗普
item.description: 加利福尼亚州和其他 15 个州周三起诉特朗普政府，称联邦政府非法扣留了之前发放给各州的数十亿美元电动汽车充电资金。【原文：California and 15 other states sued the Trump administration on Wednesday, saying the federal government is illegally withholding billions in previously awarded funds to states for electric vehicle charging.】

item.title: 推动人工智能发展，京德利季度营收超预期
item.description: IT 服务提供商 Kyndryl 周三公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于企业对人工智能技术的强劲需求。【原文：IT services provider Kyndryl beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by robust demand from businesses adopting artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 西方石油公司报告季度利润增长
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于产量增加和有利的油气价格。【原文：Occidental Petroleum beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher production and favorable oil and gas prices.】

item.title: Bumble 预测第二季度营收低于预期
item.description: 本周三，Bumble 预测第二季度营收低于分析师预期，这表明这家约会应用运营商的扭亏为盈计划需要比预期更长的时间才能取得成效。【原文：Bumble forecast second-quarter revenue below analysts' estimate on Wednesday, signaling that the dating app operator's turnaround plan is taking longer than expected to yield results.】

item.title: 芯片技术供应商 Arm 预测第一季度营收低于预期
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势威胁到其用于智能手机和数据中心行业的芯片架构的收入，Arm Holdings 周三预测第一季度销售额和利润低于华尔街预期。【原文：Arm Holdings forecast first-quarter sales and profit below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as global trade tensions threaten revenue from its chip architecture used across the smartphone and data center industries.】

item.title: 随着阿根廷业务的蓬勃发展，MercadoLibre 第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 拉丁美洲电子商务巨头 MercadoLibre 周三公布，由于阿根廷业务反弹，第一季度净利润同比增长 44%，高于分析师预期。【原文：Latin American e-commerce giant MercadoLibre posted on Wednesday a 44% net profit increase in the first quarter from a year earlier, above analysts' estimates as operations in Argentina bounced back.】

item.title: 波音任命 Wisk Aero 首席执行官领导商用飞机产品开发
item.description: 波音公司旗下的 Wisk Aero 公司周三宣布，公司首席执行官 Brian Yutko 即将离职，接管波音公司商用飞机部门的产品开发工作。【原文：Boeing-owned Wisk Aero announced Wednesday that its CEO Brian Yutko is leaving to take over product development for Boeing's commercial airplanes division.】

item.title: 商务部表示，特朗普政府将取消拜登时代的人工智能芯片出口禁令
item.description: 美国商务部发言人周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府计划取消拜登时代对先进人工智能芯片出口的限制。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration plans to rescind Biden-era curbs on the export of advanced AI chips, a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of Commerce said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普向中国发出信号，启动计划中的贸易会议；华盛顿关注婴儿车豁免问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三建议中国启动两国即将举行的高层贸易谈判，并表示他不愿意通过削减美国对中国商品的关税来让中国政府坐到谈判桌前。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday suggested China initiated upcoming senior-level trade talks between the two countries and said he was not willing to cut U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods to get Beijing to the negotiating table.】
